Solving for n gives 319 ≤ n ≤ 3182. The number of integers from 319 to 3182 inclusive is 3182 - 319 + 1 = 2864.

The number of x-intercepts is \boxed{2864}.

So, the number of zeros would be approximately (1/(2π))(1/0.0001 - 1/0.001) = (1/(2π))(10000 - 1000) = (1/(2π))(9000) ≈ 9000/(6.28319) ≈ 1432.4.
